title: Alcove at Vicinity Apartments - Balcony Included!
posting_body: ['Alcove | 1 Bath | Starting at $1,608-$1,989/month | 560 sq.', 'ft.', 'Schedule your private tour:', '<URL>/', 'When you live here, everything is in the vicinity.', 'Located downtown in the historic Mill District neighborhood of Minneapolis, you will find your own corner of the city - harmoniously balanced by historic charm and modern convenience.', 'Find yourself within walking distance of iconic Minneapolis staples such as the Stone Arch Bridge while having accessibility to Trader Joe’s just across the street.', 'You can thrive off the energy of a vibrant urban community yet escape and recharge in the luxury of your home.', 'With a sustainable design focus and many locally sourced finishes, you will feel at ease taking in our rooftop skyline views knowing the stories that make up your home.', 'At The Vicinity, your home isn’t just a part of the neighborhood, it’s a reflection of it.', 'GAME ROOM', '- Stay warm by the fireplace and shoot some pool all winter long.', 'GARDEN', '- Soak up every minute of Minnesota summer.', 'FITNESS STUDIO', '- Take time for self-care in our state-of-the art Fitness Studio.', 'SPORTS STUDIO', '- Golf year-round with our Golf/Multi Sport Simulator.', 'DOG PARK', '- Meet up for a puppy play date right outside your door at 205 Bark - Mill District Public Dog Park.', 'HEARTH', '- Entertain in an intimate setting with the downtown skyline and U.S. Bank Stadium as your backdrop.', 'LOUNGE', '- Relax and kick your feet up.', 'THE TERRACE', '- Cozy up next to the firepit and enjoy views of the Minneapolis skyline.', 'Apartment Amenities', '• Stainless-steel gas range and French door refrigerator', '• Quartz kitchen countertops', '• Kitchen backsplash', '• Glassed-in shower', '• Master bath tile surround', '• Balcony with nearly every unit', '• Accent wood-look floating kitchen shelving (select units)', '• Elevated angled ceilings of 11’11’’ (select units – top-tier 2-bedrooms)', '• Soft-close cabinetry', '• Melamine closet shelving', '• Full-size Whirlpool washer/dryer (majority of units)', 'Additional Amenities', '• Coworking lounge with built-in booths and private conference room', '• Herb garden', '• Package Concierge', '• Coffee station', '• Parking', '• Pet Friendly', '• Residential storage', '• Bike storage', '• Dog wash', '• On-site professional management', '• 24/7 emergency maintenance', '• Direct access to future retail', 'The Vicinity also provides a select number of Income-Restricted Units.', 'Income-Restricted applications must be submitted in person, at the office.', 'Please contact a Vicinity team member to schedule an appointment.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
